statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_disparities;
SELECT organization_id, population_group FROM healthcare_disparities;
SELECT healthcare_access_score, healthcare_utilization_score FROM healthcare_disparities;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_disparities WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT population_group, healthcare_access_score FROM healthcare_disparities WHERE healthcare_utilization_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_disparities WHERE organization_id = 1 ORDER BY healthcare_utilization_score DESC
SELECT organization_id, population_group FROM healthcare_disparities WHERE healthcare_access_score > 80
SELECT population_group, healthcare_access_score FROM healthcare_disparities WHERE healthcare_utilization_score < 50
SELECT MAX(healthcare_access_score), MIN(healthcare_utilization_score) FROM healthcare_disparities
SELECT * FROM healthcare_disparities WHERE organization_id IN (2, 3, 4)
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_ethnicity = 'African American';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_type FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_type FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT patient_name, patient_age, COUNT(appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT disparity_type, affected_population, date_reported FROM HealthcareDisparities WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, location FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthcareDisparities WHERE status = 'ongoing';
SELECT provider_name, contact_number FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointment_data ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM provider_data WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT population_id, population_name, demographic_data FROM population_data;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM provider_data ORDER BY provider_name ASC;

SELECT patient_data.patient_name, provider_data.provider_name, appointment_data.appointment_date FROM appointment_data JOIN patient_data ON appointment_data.patient_id = patient_data.patient_id JOIN provider_data ON appointment_data.provider_id = provider_data.provider_id WHERE appointment_data.status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT population_id, population_name, demographic_data->'age' AS average_age FROM population_data WHERE population_name LIKE '%health%';
SELECT * FROM hospital ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM hospital WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM hospital WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM patient ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM patient WHERE race = 'Asian';
SELECT * FROM hospital ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM hospital WHERE location='New York';
SELECT patient.id, patient.name, appointment.appointment_date, appointment.status FROM patient INNER JOIN appointment ON patient.id = appointment.patient_id;
SELECT hospital.name, SUM(insurance.cost) AS total_cost FROM hospital INNER JOIN insurance ON hospital.id = insurance.id GROUP BY hospital.name;
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Female' AND race='Caucasian';
